metadata.title: Wednesday, 13th September, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to lease the Zambia Railways Workshop in Kabwe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) how many recruits were enrolled in the following institutions, from 2020 to 2022, year by year:
(i) Zambia Police Service; and (ii) Zambia Correctional Service;
(b) what the total number of recruits, segregated by gender, in each institution was;
(c) how many recruits graduated in each institution in the same period; and
(d) of the recruits who graduated, how many were receiving upkeep allowance, as of December, 2022.

questions.minister: Minister of Small and Medium Enterprise Development when the Government will set up the Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Committee in Chitambo District.
questions.question_text: PRESENTATION OF GOVERNMENT BILLS The Minister of Justice The Criminal Procedure Code (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Criminal Procedure Code. (N.A.B 19/2023) The Minister of Justice The Penal Code (Amendment) – Bill to amend the Penal Code. (N.A.B 20/2023) The Minister of Local Government and Rural Development The Constituency Development Fund – Bill to provide for the decentralisation of the management, disbursement, utilisation and accountability of the Constituency Development Fund; continue the existence of the Constituency Development Fund Committee and re-define its functions; revise the composition of the Constituency Development Fund Committee; establish the Provincial Constituency Development Fund Committee; repeal and replace the Constituency Development Fund Act, 2018; and provide for matters connected with, or incidental to, the foregoing. (N.A.B 21/2023) NOTICE OF MOTION Ms Sefulo Thanks - The President’s Address : That the thanks of this Assembly be recorded for the exposition of public policy contained in the President’s Address. ___________________________
